name: PHP - Laravel Integration
description: Sentry configuration for Laravel applications with automatic request tracking
useCase: Laravel web applications with performance monitoring
seGuidance: Recommended for all Laravel customers. The Laravel integration automatically captures request context, user info, and queue job failures. Performance monitoring helps identify slow database queries and controller actions. Set SENTRY_DSN in your .env file.
configCode:
<?php
// config/sentry.php

return [
    'dsn' => env('SENTRY_DSN'),
    
    // Environment from Laravel config
    'environment' => env('APP_ENV', 'production'),
    
    // Release version
    'release' => env('SENTRY_RELEASE', '1.0.0'),
    
    // Performance monitoring
    'traces_sample_rate' => (float) env('SENTRY_TRACES_SAMPLE_RATE', 0.1),
    
    // Capture user context
    'send_default_pii' => false,
    
    // Breadcrumb limit
    'max_breadcrumbs' => 50,
    
    // Exclude routes from tracing
    'trace_propagation_targets' => [
        env('APP_URL'),
    ],
];
